title: Guide To Critter Companionship
summaries: The Guide To Critter Companionship is a tool that prevents player attacks from harming critters. It is not an accessory and will work as long as it is in the player's main inventory. It is purchased from the Zoologist for 5.

statistics.Tooltip: Prevents you from hurting critters while in the inventory
statistics.Buy: 5
statistics.Sell: 1

result.value: [img:Guide to Peaceful Coexistence]Guide to Peaceful Coexistence
